paper_title.ja: 半導体レーザーを利用したレーザー植物工場
paper_title.en: Laser Plant Factory Utilizing Laser Diodes

paper_title.ja: 赤色LDパルス光が植物生育に及ぼす影響
白色LEDパルス光がサラダナ生育に及ぼす影響
レーザー光によるサラダナ栽培実験
paper_title.en: Growth Experiment in Lettuce using Laser Light

description.ja: Photosynthetic rate, relative growth rate and vitaminC contents were measured in lettuce cultivated under red and blue lasers and the results were compared with those cultivated under light emitting diodes (LED). It was found that lettuce grew fairly healthily under red laser diode (650 nm) and blue laser (442 nm) with R/B ratio 10. However, both photosynthetic rate and growth rate rather diminished compared with LED cases. As for vitaminC contents, the result was about the same as LED cases.
description.en: Photosynthetic rate, relative growth rate and vitaminC contents were measured in lettuce cultivated under red and blue lasers and the results were compared with those cultivated under light emitting diodes (LED). It was found that lettuce grew fairly healthily under red laser diode (650 nm) and blue laser (442 nm) with R/B ratio 10. However, both photosynthetic rate and growth rate rather diminished compared with LED cases. As for vitaminC contents, the result was about the same as LED cases.

paper_title.en: The Way of Thinking Towards the Synergy of Knowledges -Scientific Thought and Intuition

description.ja: 異常気象,土地浸食などの環境問題や人口増大の影響で, 21世紀前半以降の人類の食糧問題が懸念されている.従来の土地利用型農業だけでは,特に日本の食糧を支えきれない可能性がある.そこで,植物工場のような超集約的食糧生産技術の実用化が期待される.応用物理的技術の応用として,発光ダイオードやレーザーダイオードを植物栽培用の光源として利用する可能性について論じる.

publisher.ja: The Japan Society of Applied Physics
publisher.en: The Japan Society of Applied Physics

paper_title.ja: 発光ダイオードと半導体レーザーがサラダナ生育に及ぼす影響
paper_title.en: Influence of LED and LD Lights on the Growth of Lettuce

description.ja: Photosynthetic rate and growth rate measurements were carried out for lettuce using red laser diodes (LD) and various spectra of light emitting diodes (LED). It was found that lettuce grew healthily under red LD (650 nm) and blue LED with R/B ratio 10. However, both photosynthetic rate and growth rate rather diminished compared with LED case.
description.en: Photosynthetic rate and growth rate measurements were carried out for lettuce using red laser diodes (LD) and various spectra of light emitting diodes (LED). It was found that lettuce grew healthily under red LD (650 nm) and blue LED with R/B ratio 10. However, both photosynthetic rate and growth rate rather diminished compared with LED case.

paper_title.ja: 文理シナジーの発想(単著)
レーザー植物工場の提案
paper_title.en: Topical Papers on Applications of Lasers to Plant Factory. Proposal of a Laser Plant Factory.

description.ja: Possibility of a completely-controlled plant factory using red laser diodes (LD) together with blue LD or light emitting diodes (LED) is discussed. It is shown that laser plant factory (LPF) may be materialized if the price of LD becomes several handreds yen per 1W of output power. Recent rapid progress and price reduction of LD for digital video disc (DVD) support the realization of LPF in near future.
description.en: Possibility of a completely-controlled plant factory using red laser diodes (LD) together with blue LD or light emitting diodes (LED) is discussed. It is shown that laser plant factory (LPF) may be materialized if the price of LD becomes several handreds yen per 1W of output power. Recent rapid progress and price reduction of LD for digital video disc (DVD) support the realization of LPF in near future.
